short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevents teams from messaging same IG profile more than once

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension saves you time of searching through list of profile(usernames) that have once been messaged by any team member as listed in the SocialBloom -Data Tracking Google sheet, ensuring you don't have to message them again.

You will see a notification of whether the profile is okay to be messaged or not once you load any profile after installing the extension.

Thank you.
